concept.title: 8.608 Protection of classified and sensitive information.

conbody.p: Agencies shall not enter into any contract with FPI that allows an inmate worker access to any-

li.p:
(b)
Geographic data regarding the location of-

(1)
Surface and subsurface infrastructure providing communications or water or electrical power distribution;

(2)
Pipelines for the distribution of natural gas, bulk petroleum products, or other commodities; or

(c)
Personal or financial information about any individual private citizen, including information relating to such personâ€™s real property however described, without the prior consent of the individual.
